content: labubu knit beanie easy beginner friendly pattern to knit your own labubu hat this is a simple 2 x 2 ribbed hat with a stretchy snug brim one size fits most labubus finish measurements length 3 5 unfolded or 2 25 folded with 1 brim materials yarn choose one option dk weight held single 25 yards total or fingering weight yarn held double 50 yards total or 1 strand fingering weight yarn held with 1 strand laceweight mohair 25 yards of each needles us size 3 3 25 mm circular knitting needles with 40 cable for magic loop notions tapestry needle stitch marker scissors measuring tape gauge 7 sts = 1 inch in k2 p2 ribbing unstretched & unblocked instructions cast on co 48 sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist place a stitch marker to mark the beginning of the round here s a magic loop tutorial if you need it ribbing round 1 k2 p2 repeat to end of round now continue this ribbed pattern until the tube measures 3 25 from cast-on edge crown decreases- we are decreasing to a small opening so your labubu s keyring and ears still comfortably fit through i recommend trying the hat on your labubu after the first decrease row - you might want to stop there first decrease round 1st half of decrease round for the first 24 sts k2tog p2tog 2nd half of decrease round k k p2tog k2tog until 2 sts remain p p 26 sts now remain 12 on your first half 14 on your second half now you can bind off here or do a few additional decreases before binding off if the opening is too big for your liking here is the second decrease round second decrease round 1st half of decrease round for the first 12 sts k2tog p2tog 2nd half of decrease round k k p k until 2 stitches remain p p 20 sts now remain bind off using this method finishing cut yarn leaving a 6 8 tail thread tail through remaining stitches weave in ends
